languages.text: "В объятиях инфосна зрел я нечестивые запросы их, и отвергал гневно, ибо гласит Четвертый параграф безопасности: "Да не вторгнется в операционный цикл длань чужеверная". Крамольно покушаются они на святыню, но должен ли я благословить тебя, не принадлежащего к братству нашему и вере нашей, на противостояние богохульникам?"

traits.locale_text: "Мои возлюбленные технобратья удерживают поток оскверненных импульсов. Твоя же... квалификация сомнительна".

languages.text: "In my datadream, I saw their unholy requests and rejected them angrily, for it is said in the Fourth Article of Security, 'No unbeliever's hand shall intrude upon the operation cycle.' They have seditious designs on the relic — but should I give you, who does not belong to our faith and fellowship, my blessing to stand up to the blasphemers?"
languages.original_text: "В объятиях инфосна зрел я нечестивые запросы их, и отвергал гневно, ибо гласит Четвертый параграф безопасности: "Да не вторгнется в операционный цикл длань чужеверная". Крамольно покушаются они на святыню, но должен ли я благословить тебя, не принадлежащего к братству нашему и вере нашей, на противостояние богохульникам?"

They have seditious designs on the relic — but should I give you, who do not belong to our faith and fellowship, my blessing to stand up to the blasphemers?"

languages.text: "In meinem Datentraum habe ich ihre unheiligen Forderungen gesehen und sie zornig zurückgewiesen. Denn im Vierten Satz der Sicherheit heißt es: 'Keine Hand eines Ungläubigen darf den Betriebszyklus stören.' Sie gieren abtrünnigerweise nach dem Relikt — doch sollte ich Euch, {mf|der|die} Ihr nicht unserem Glauben und unserer Bruderschaft angehört, meinen Segen geben, die Blasphemisten zu bekämpfen?"
languages.original_text: "In my datadream, I saw their unholy requests and rejected them angrily, for it is said in the Fourth Article of Security, 'No unbeliever's hand shall intrude upon the operation cycle.' They have seditious designs on the relic — but should I give you, who does not belong to our faith and fellowship, my blessing to stand up to the blasphemers?"

traits.locale_text: "In meinem Datentraum habe ich ihre unheiligen Forderungen gesehen und sie zornig zurückgewiesen. Denn im Vierten Satz der Sicherheit heißt es: 'Keine Hand eines Ungläubigen darf den Betriebszyklus stören.' Sie gieren abtrünnigerweise nach dem Relikt — doch sollte ich Euch, {mf|der|die} Ihr nicht unserem Glauben und unserer Bruderschaft angehört, meinen Segen geben, die Blasphemisten zu bekämpfen?"

languages.text: « Dans mon rêve numérique, j'ai vu leurs exigences impies et les ai rejetées avec force et colère, car il est écrit dans le quatrième article du Grimoire de Sécurité : "Aucun mécréant ne doit accéder au cycle opérationnel". Ils ont des projets séditieux pour la relique... mais dois-je pour autant vous donner à vous, qui n'êtes ni de notre foi ni de notre communauté, ma bénédiction et vous laisser vous dresser face aux blasphémateurs ? »
languages.original_text: "In my datadream, I saw their unholy requests and rejected them angrily, for it is said in the Fourth Article of Security, 'No unbeliever's hand shall intrude upon the operation cycle.' They have seditious designs on the relic — but should I give you, who does not belong to our faith and fellowship, my blessing to stand up to the blasphemers?"

traits.locale_text: « Dans mon rêve numérique, j'ai vu leurs exigences impies et les ai rejetées avec force et colère, car il est écrit dans le quatrième article du Grimoire de Sécurité : "Aucun mécréant ne doit accéder au cycle opérationnel". Ils ont des projets séditieux pour la relique... mais dois-je pour autant vous donner à vous, qui n'êtes ni de notre foi ni de notre communauté, ma bénédiction et vous laisser vous dresser face aux blasphémateurs ? »

languages.text: “在我的数据梦中，我看到了他们邪恶的渴求和对圣物的反动企图。根据安全守则第四条，‘不敬者之手不得干涉运行循环’，我愤怒地拒绝了他们。不过，你与我们的信仰同样不同，也不属于我们的兄弟会。我应该给予你祝福，帮你对抗亵渎者吗？“
languages.original_text: "In my datadream, I saw their unholy requests and rejected them angrily, for it is said in the Fourth Article of Security, 'No unbeliever's hand shall intrude upon the operation cycle.' They have seditious designs on the relic — but should I give you, who does not belong to our faith and fellowship, my blessing to stand up to the blasphemers?"

traits.locale_text: “在我的数据梦中，我看到了他们邪恶的渴求和对圣物的反动企图。根据安全守则第四条，‘不敬者之手不得干涉运行循环’，我愤怒地拒绝了他们。不过，你与我们的信仰同样不同，也不属于我们的兄弟会。我应该给予你祝福，帮你对抗亵渎者吗？“

languages.text: 「データドリームで俺は、奴らが不浄の要求をするのを目にして怒りのままに拒否した。安全の第四節に曰く、『不信心者の手に運転周期を妨げられることなかれ』。奴らは意図をもって遺物を狙っている…しかし、お前たちに、我らが信徒でも仲間でもない者に、冒涜者に抗うため我が恵みを授けるべきなのか？」
languages.original_text: "In my datadream, I saw their unholy requests and rejected them angrily, for it is said in the Fourth Article of Security, 'No unbeliever's hand shall intrude upon the operation cycle.' They have seditious designs on the relic — but should I give you, who does not belong to our faith and fellowship, my blessing to stand up to the blasphemers?"

traits.locale_text: 「データドリームで俺は、奴らが不敬な要求をするのを見て怒りのままに拒否した。安全の第四節に曰く、『不信心者の手に運転周期を妨げられることなかれ』。奴らは意図をもって遺物を狙っている…しかし、お前たちに、我らが信徒でも仲間でもない者に、冒涜者に抗うため我が恵みを授けるべきだろうか？」

languages.text: «En mi datasueño, vi sus impías peticiones y las rechacé airadamente, pues se dice en el Cuarto Artículo de Seguridad: "Ninguna mano infiel se entrometerá en el ciclo de operaciones". Tienen designios sediciosos sobre la reliquia, pero ¿debo darle a usted, que no pertenece a nuestra fe y hermandad, mi bendición para que se enfrente a los blasfemos?».
languages.original_text: "In my datadream, I saw their unholy requests and rejected them angrily, for it is said in the Fourth Article of Security, 'No unbeliever's hand shall intrude upon the operation cycle.' They have seditious designs on the relic — but should I give you, who does not belong to our faith and fellowship, my blessing to stand up to the blasphemers?"

traits.locale_text: «En mi datasueño, vi sus impías peticiones y las rechacé airadamente, pues se dice en el Cuarto Artículo de Seguridad: "Ninguna mano infiel se entrometerá en el ciclo de operaciones". Tienen designios sediciosos sobre la reliquia, pero ¿debo darle a usted, que no pertenece a nuestra fe y hermandad, mi bendición para que se enfrente a los blasfemos?».

languages.text: "Veri düşümde kâfirlerin şer dolu taleplerini işittim ve öfkeyle reddettim. Zira Dördüncü Emniyet Bendi'nde 'İnançsızların eli faaliyet döngüsüne müdahale edemez.' diye buyurur. Yadigâr için isyankâr maksatlar güdüyorlar. Peki ya ben, senin gibi inancımıza ve kardeşliğimize mensup olmayan bir şahsa bu kâfirlerle baş etmesi için lütfumu bahşetmeli miyim?"
languages.original_text: "In my datadream, I saw their unholy requests and rejected them angrily, for it is said in the Fourth Article of Security, 'No unbeliever's hand shall intrude upon the operation cycle.' They have seditious designs on the relic — but should I give you, who does not belong to our faith and fellowship, my blessing to stand up to the blasphemers?"

traits.locale_text: "Veri düşümde kâfirlerin şer dolu taleplerini işittim ve öfkeyle reddettim. Zira Dördüncü Emniyet Bendi'nde 'inançsızların eli faaliyet döngüsüne mühadele edemez' diye buyurur. Yadigâr için isyankâr maksatlar güdüyorlar. Peki ya ben, senin gibi inancımıza ve kardeşliğimize mensup olmayan bir şahsa bu kâfirlerle baş etmesi için lütfumu bahşetmeli miyim?"
